reviewtext: Go this along with my Rebel XTi 18-55 kit.  Not bad.  Great lens for action, sports, or wildlife.  You can also create great depth with this one.  Wish the aperture would open up to 3 at least.  I shot hockey for an assignment and really had a tough time, I got my shots, but I could've gotten more with a larger ap.  Will upgrade on this in the next couple years.  They make a 70-300 USM with IS that I will replace this with eventually, but for right now, this is nice to have in my case, just in. . . case.
summary: Long Focal Length on the Cheap
